name: Pok Pok Ny's Hunny
description: Grapefruit, tequila and lime get a honey-vinegar boost in this citrus-forward cocktail from Pok Pok Ny.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce fresh lime juice from about 2 limes
2 ounces fresh grapefruit juice, from 1 pink grapefruit
1 ounce Som Honey drinking vinegar (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine tequila, lime juice, grapefruit juice, and Som drinking vinegar.
Fill shaker with ice and shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled rocks glass. Garnish with a wedge of grapefruit.
